name: Zac
description:
"Each t shirt has it's own character whereby you decide it's personality...we only decide the name." - Fudge Apparel

Name: Zac
Release date: 15/8/13

Bio: 

Zac and Justin were released in a unique range under the Fudge Apparel brand. However, like Stan, Carl and Lilli they share a storyline. 

Zac, who's best friend is Justin, is a more careful character with a slightly less dangerous side. Zac keeps to himself most of the time, which cannot be said for his best friend Justin. Zac, does however, has his loud moments, mostly shared with Justin.

...well, that's what we think at Fudge Apparel. You decide the rest of his story.


Info:

Zac was in fact the first design created by the Fudge Apparel Team. Zac came from an evolution of different designs from a copyrighted image off Google to being molded into our own image of the present character you see before you, entitled Zac.

At a later date an image archive will be created to show the evolution of Fudge Apparel's first character. We will show how we brought a lifeless image from Google into a unique character with a story...

name: Justin
description:
"Each t shirt has it's own character whereby you decide it's personality...we only decide the name." - Fudge Apparel

Name: Justin
Release date: 15/7/13

Bio:

Like Zac, Justin was released under a unique range to that of Stan, Carl and Lilli. However, like them, Justin shares an individual story.

Justin's personality is as unique as the design itself. Justin provides life to the "double act" that is Justin and Zac. An outgoing character with a positive outlook on life. Justin is what creates the bond between him and his best friend Zac. Undeniably creative with a passion for artwork


...well, that's what we think. You decide the rest of his story.

name: Lilli
description:
"Each t shirt has it's own character whereby you decide it's personality...we only decide the name." - Fudge Apparel

Name: Lilli
Release date: 18/8/13

Bio: 

Lilli is the first female Fudge Apparel character. Lilli is Stan's secret crush however, unbeknown to Stan, Carl also has a soft spot for our Lilli. The big question is, does Lilli; the kind hearted, out going natural beauty share the same feelings for either Carl or Stan.

Well, that's what we at Fudge Apparel think. You make the rest of the story...

name: Carl
description:
"Each t shirt has it's own character whereby you decide it's personality...we only decide the name." - Fudge Apparel

Name: Carl
Release Date: 15/7/13

Bio: 

Carl is the character that needs to be tamed the most, a job that Stan does a lot, being his best friend. Carl is certainly the loudest most out going character, however he is in a world of his own and never completely with reality. 

Like Stan, Carl has a secret soft spot for Lilly (coming soon...) however, his best friend Stan does not know this... trouble could be looming.

...well, that's what we think. Do you have another story for these lovable characters?

name: Stan
description:
"Each t shirt has it's own character whereby you decide it's personality...we only decide the name." - Fudge Apparel


Name: Stan
Release date: 15/7/13
Bio: 

Lively is one way to describe Stan but when in the presence of his best friend Carl he can become a bit of handful. With the two energies of the best friends combined they're playful and excitable, but sometimes very annoying.

However, out of all the characters Stan is the friendliest with a soft spot for Lilly (coming soon...) however Carl is not to know about this for he share's similar feelings. 

...well, that's what we think.
